b'Our democracy works best when everyone participates. That\xe2\x80\x99s why @interpublicipg is 100% In. Head to the link in our bio to learn more. #fordemocracy :ballot_box_with_ballot::hundred_points::United_States:'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cPhilippe is the right CEO for the next era at IPG\xe2\x80\x9d :sparkles:\n\nThis morning, IPG announced CEO succession, naming Philippe Krakowsky CEO, effective January 1st, 2021 when Michael Roth will assume the role of Executive Chairman. Congratulations to both Philippe and Michael! Link in bio for more...'

b'Sick of worrying if your vote will be counted? Take a #SickOfItDay and vote early to make sure your vote counts. \n\n@hugeinc and @interpublicipg roll out a nationwide ad campaign that encourages folks to take a \xe2\x80\x9csick of it day\xe2\x80\x9d to cast their ballot. Swipe up in our IG story to read more in @adweek. #Vote2020 #VoteEarly :ballot_box_with_ballot:'

b'Highlights from yesterday\xe2\x80\x99s @umworldwide annual #UMImpactDay across the globe. Head to their account for more! #UMBetterWorld'

b':camera_with_flash: : @jackmorton - While celebrations may be different this year, the support, unity and all that Pride stands for continues. At Jack, we shared our support, and celebrated the progress marked by the recent U.S. Supreme Court decision affirming inclusion in the workplace. Let\xe2\x80\x99s all continue to promote inclusiveness, drive allyship, and fight for equality in the LGBTQ+ community - each and every day. #PrideMonth'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWe need more than empathy. All of us need to get on board to making a more just world. And racial equality and racial justice are not charity.\xe2\x80\x9d Thank you @esglaude for joining us on this #Juneteenth2020 and thank you to IPG D&I and IPG\xe2\x80\x99s Black Employee Network for organizing this informative program. And thank you all for listening and learning. :black_heart:'

b'Join IPG D&I and IPG\xe2\x80\x99s Black Employee Network this Friday as they host a virtual town hall in observance of #Juneteenth2020, with special guest Prof. Eddie S. Glaude Jr. of Princeton University, and remarks from IPG\xe2\x80\x99s Chairman and CEO Michael Roth and EVP, COO Philippe Krakowsky. Link in our bio for more.\n....\nOn June 19, 1865, Texas was the final state to outlaw chattel slavery of African Americans. This day of freedom has become known as #Juneteenth. Historical perspective is critical for understanding our present and shaping a new future. Join IPG\xe2\x80\x99s BEN for perspectives and information from one of America\xe2\x80\x99s leading scholars and media commentators.'

b'In honor of #PrideMonth, IPGLBT has created downloadable content, along with a great lineup of #pride:rainbow: programming. Swipe to learn more about the history of each LGBTQ+ flag and head to the link in our bio for more on upcoming programs. #IPGPride :rainbow_flag_selector:'

b'IPG is making donations to @amnesty, @campaignzero and @naacp_ldf - organizations on the frontline to promote global human rights, end police brutality and provide legal support to protestors. And we invite you to join us. Head to the link in our bio to learn more.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cAs a company that creates advertising and marketing messages, we have an opportunity to make a difference. More than an opportunity, a responsibility.\xe2\x80\x9d Head to the link in our bio to read IPG Chairman and CEO Michael Roth\xe2\x80\x99s letter in full.'

b'This morning, IPG hosted a live town hall for IPG Corporate employees across the globe. CEO Michael Roth, CFO Ellen Johnson and COO Philippe Krakowsky checked in with employees and answered questions live via @microsoft Teams, moderated by VP, Corporate Comms Tom Cunningham.'

b'Look at that multi-tasking! @adweek features @deutschinc NY CEO Val DiFebo in its \xe2\x80\x9cPortraits: 9 Industry Leaders Guiding Their Teams While Navigating the \xe2\x80\x98New Normal\xe2\x80\x99\xe2\x80\x9d series.\n\nHere, Val stays energized by taking her meetings outdoors (even with the temperature barely hitting 50 degrees) for a change of scenery.'

b'Earth Day looks a bit different this year, but at IPG we are still celebrating from home. We are measuring more of our carbon footprint than ever before and have made a commitment to reducing our impact on the environment. Head to the link in our bio for more on how IPG is making sustainability a priority. Happy Earth Day! :globe_showing_Americas::globe_showing_Europe-Africa::globe_showing_Asia-Australia:'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWe have never been more proud of our people and our agencies than during the last several weeks...we share the honor with all the A-Listers. Not just with our agencies on the list and the whole industry. We share the honor with the people working in medical and health care, transit, delivery, grocery and pharmacies, and all the other A-Listers out there, working every day to make a positive impact in the world. They are the true heroes.\xe2\x80\x9d - IPG Chairman & CEO Michael Roth celebrates IPG leading the industry on @adage A-List.'

b'That\xe2\x80\x99s one way to get the creative juices flowing...Don\xe2\x80\x99t try this at home folks, she\xe2\x80\x99s a pro. :camera_with_flash: : @lolamullenlowe - Day 30 of self quarantine. We miss each other, we have good days and bad days, some days we\xe2\x80\x99re productive and other days we can barely move. It\xe2\x80\x99s an upside down time that will be right side up soon. :collision: Just gotta \xe2\x80\x9cHang in there\xe2\x80\x9d amigos. :winking_face_with_tongue: Pic features @carolinanp our Senior Creative and personal yoga guru.:woman_in_lotus_position_selector:'

b'We love this #NotesToFutureSelf series from @martinagency. b'While we continue to social distance and work from home, we want to thank our IT teams across the globe for keeping us up and running. This transition would not be possible without you - thank you! :clapping_hands: Head to the link in our bio for more information on how IPG is responding to #COVID19'

b'One of the many things that made us smile this week... :camera_with_flash: : @deutschinc - In times of crisis, we join together stronger than ever. On Monday we held our regular all-agency huddle as usual, but this time online. @adweek captured the result: 200+ faces across a computer screen beaming with enthusiasm and camaraderie.'

b':camera_with_flash: : @mccann_mw - Our teams from McCann Worldgroup China are happy to be back in the office, as local restrictions have been eased for the time being.
